MAX_UDP_SEND

static final int MAX_UDP_SEND
UDP maximum send message size. MAX_UDP: 1500 (max of ethernet and 802.{2,3} MTU) - 20/40(IPv4/IPv6) - 8(UDP) - some reserve (the MTU of Ethernet is currently independent of its speed variant)

See Also:
